document_data.name: Cleansing of the Council
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cleansing of the Council''' was a mass political assassination that occurred in [[Zhentil Keep]] during the {{YearlinkName|752}}.<ref name=GHoTR-p101>
document_data.Activities: [[Zhentar]] decided to eliminate all of those on the [[Council of Lords (Zhentil Keep)|Council of Lords]] who were opposed to his rule, resulting in the assassinations of six of the twelve lords on the council.<ref name=GHoTR-p101/>
